metadata.title: Evaluating Fomite Risk of Brown Paper Bags Storing Personal Protective Equipment Exposed to SARS-CoV-2: A Quasi-Experimental Study

BIBREF0.title: Transmission of COVID-19 to Health Care Personnel During Exposures to a Hospitalized Patient

BIBREF1.title: An international survey of healthcare workers use of personal protective equipment during the early stages of the COVID 19 pandemic
BIBREF1.venue: Journal of the American College of Emergency Physicians Open

BIBREF2.title: Strategies for Optimizing the Supply of N95 Respirators

BIBREF3.title: Assessment of influenza virus exposure and recovery from contaminated surgical masks and N95 respirators

BIBREF4.title: Validation and application of models to predict facemask influenza contamination in healthcare settings

BIBREF5.title: Considerations for Recommending Extended Use and Limited Reuse of Filtering Facepiece Respirators in Health Care Settings
BIBREF5.venue: Journal of Occupational and Environmental Hygiene

BIBREF6.title: Understanding the factors involved in determining the bioburdens of surgical masks

BIBREF7.title: Aerosol and Surface Stability of SARS-CoV-2 as Compared with SARS-CoV-1

BIBREF8.title: Environmental Sampling for Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 During a COVID-19 Outbreak on the Diamond Princess Cruise Ship

BIBREF9.title: Transfer efficiency of bacteria and viruses from porous and nonporous fomites to fingers under different relative humidity conditions
